meanings: (지능이 부족한 사람) person with mental retardation[handicap, impairment]
(어리석고 멍청한 사람) fool, (informal) idiot, (informal) blockhead, (informal) dimwit, (offensive) stupid, (offensive) moron, (impolite) ...
